meanings.definition: The quality or state of being irascible.
meanings.sent1: His constant irascibilities made it difficult to work with him.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't control her irascibilities when things didn't go her way.
meanings.sent3: Despite his irascibilities, he always had a kind smile for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The stormy weather matched the irascibilities of his temper.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's irascibilities were legendary among the students.

meanings.definition: A feeling of anger or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: The customer's irascibilities were evident when his order was delayed.
meanings.sent2: She tried to hide her irascibilities, but her clenched fists gave her away.
meanings.sent3: His irascibilities towards the noisy neighbors were comically loud.
meanings.sent4: The irascibilities of the traffic seemed to mirror his own frustration.
meanings.sent5: The irascibilities in his voice were unmistakable as he argued with the referee.
